comment: went with a short 3 day dh.

1.057 down to 1.010, just kegged it and its tasting great. I went with 2 oz centennial and 1 oz mandarina Bavaria. I will note that this yeast needs a little extra time and encouragement. The krausen dropped after a week, the beer was still at 1.030. This is with me ramping temp from 68-72 degrees! I gave it a good shake and it went off again, then finished out ok.
